preconditions.precondition: The Customer Manager is logged in to the system.

mainSequence.step: Customer Manager selects the option to edit a job opening.
System requests the Customer Manager to input a job reference.
Customer Manager inputs the Job Reference.
System shows Job Opening details and asks the Customer Manager if they want to update the description.
System asks if the Customer Manager wants to update the address.
System asks if the Customer Manager wants to update the Mode.
System asks if the Customer Manager wants to update the Contract Type.
System asks if the Customer Manager wants to update the job title.
System asks if the Customer Manager wants to update the number of vacancies.
System requests the Customer Manager for new values to update.
Customer Manager inputs the new values.
System displays the updated Job Opening and shows the operation success.
